welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yokaichiba, where traditional charm meets modern comforts. Explore our historic temples, try our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Yokaichiba."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights for Japan Airlines and other carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving low-cost carriers and mainly domestic flights for Jetstar Japan and other airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting the SSID and following the instructions.
